welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Radlje ob Dravi, Slovenia! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its picturesque landscapes and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Radlje ob Dravi has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Maribor International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations at Maribor International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for 2 hours with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thalerhof Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login.
